Brazil: Francisco becomes the last person to be executed in Brazil when he is hanged in Pilar, Alagoas.
China: The Qing dynasty and the United Kingdom signed the Chefoo Convention, under which Qing promised to punish those responsible for Margary's murder and repeal the likin.
Colombia: Aquileo Parra is President of the United States of Colombia
Haiti: President Domingue is overthrown; the Constituent Assembly elects Pierre Théoma Boisrond-Canal to a four-year term as President
Japan: Akizuki Rebellion, Hagi Rebellion and Shinpūren Rebellion
Russia: The Khanate of Kokand was incorporated into the Russian Empire. April Uprising: Bulgarian nationalists attacked the Ottoman police headquarters in Oborishte. Alexander signed the Ems Ukaz, banning the use of the Ukrainian language in print. A secret treaty prepared for the division of the Balkans between Russia and Austria-Hungary, depending on the outcome of local revolutionary movements. Kazan demonstration: A political demonstration in front of the Kazan Cathedral in Saint Petersburg marked the appearance of the revolutionary group Land and Liberty.
Singapore: Victoria School was established in Kampong Glam.
Tanzania: Barghash bin Said closes Zanzibar's slave market.
